DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.Id, T1.GroupingId, T4.value IndexBased, T5.value IndexName, T6.value Calendar, T7.value Convention, T8.value EOM, T9.value DayCounter, T1.SettlementDays FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsDeposit T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T4 ON T1.IndexBased = T4.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName T5 ON T1.IndexName = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T6 ON T1.Calendar = T6.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention T7 ON T1.Convention = T7.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T8 ON T1.EOM = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter T9 ON T1.DayCounter = T9.value

field.name: *IndexBased
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value IndexBased, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: IndexName
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value IndexName,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesIndexName !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Calendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Calendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Convention
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Convention,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: EOM
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value EOM, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: DayCounter
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value DayCounter, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter !T! ORDER BY value
